title: Dried fruit compote
ingredients: ['450ml (16fl oz) orange juice', '85g (3oz) clear honey', '1 teaspoon finely grated orange zest', '1 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'pinch of ground cloves', 'pinch of grated nutmeg', '225g (8oz) mixed dried fruit, such as prunes, apricots, apples and peaches', '40g (11/2oz) currants or raisins']
